```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Read in some data

read in the litters dataset(litter-level data).

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("./data/FAS_litters.csv")
# follow up step immediately after import data; i can also load all janitor package in setup
litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```


## Take a look at the data

Printing in the console.

```{r}
litters_df
```

```{r}
head(litters_df)
```

```{r}
tail(litters_df)
```

```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```

## Options to read_csv

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("./data/FAS_litters.csv", skip = 10, col_names = FALSE, 
                      na = c("", "NA", 999))
```
